DOC.brief_summary: The aim Danish Organization Randomized Trials Clinical Outcome ( SORT OUT ) compare safety efficacy polymer-free Biolimus-eluting BIOFREEDOM stent biodegradable-polymer Sirolimus-eluting ORSIRO stent population-based setting , use registry detection clinically driven event
DOC.brief_title: BIOFREEDOM Stent Versus ORSIRO Stent : SORT OUT IX
DOC.detailed_description: SORT OUT IX randomize , multicenter , all-comer , two-arm , non-inferiority trial compare polymer-free Biolimus-eluting BIOFREEDOM stent biodegradable-polymer Sirolimus-eluting ORSIRO stent treat atherosclerotic coronary artery lesion . Patients enrol investigator randomly allocate treatment group diagnostic coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention . Block randomization centre ( permuted block random size ( 2/4/6 ) ) use assign patient 1:1 ratio receive polymer-free Biolimus-eluting BIOFREEDOM stent ( Biosensors ) biodegradable-polymer Sirolimus-eluting ORSIRO stent ( Biotronik ) . A web base Trial Partner randomization system use .
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 year chronic stable coronary artery disease acute coronary syndrome , least one coronary artery lesion 50 % diameter stenosis , require treatment drugeluting stent . Life expectancy less one year ; allergy aspirin , clopidogrel , ticagrelor , prasugral , biolimus sirolimus ; participation another randomize trial ; inability provide write informed consent .
